trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> objects that are selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
The order of columns in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션의 열 순서는 선택 된 순서와 일치 하도록 보장 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> does not perform efficiently when working with large numbers of columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> 다 수의 열을 작업할 때 효율적으로 수행 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controls will not contain enough columns for this to be an issue, but if you are working with large numbers of columns, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine if the entire grid is selected, or you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to determine the number of selected columns (or the number of columns in a specified state).
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 컨트롤이 문제가 발생할 수에 대 한 충분 한 열이 포함 되는 하지만 다 수의 열을 사용 하는 경우 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AreAllCellsSelected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 전체 표 선택 되어 있거나 사용할 수 있는지를 확인할는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 확인 하려면 선택 된 열 (또는 지정된 된 상태에 있는 열의 수)의 수입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [Windows Forms DataGridView 컨트롤의 크기 조정에 대 한 유용한](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 이 클래스와 관련이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 변경할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> 클래스를 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 지우려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClearSelection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" />.
Determines whether the specified column is contained in the collection.
<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> parameter is in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
<paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
The zero-based index at which the column should be inserted.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" />.
Inserts a column into the collection at the specified position.
This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 이 클래스와 관련이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> class directly.
trans-unit.target: 변경할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> 클래스를 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To insert a column into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 열에 삽입 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Always thrown.
The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> to get from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection" />.
Gets the column at the specified index.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스의 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than 0.
-or-
<paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the number of columns in the collection.
Gets the list of elements contained in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection" /> instance.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> containing the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 컬렉션의 요소를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> unless overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 반환 <see langword="null" /> 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되지 않는 경우.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
Copies the elements of the collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
<paramref name="array" /> is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellCollection" /> is greater than the available space from <paramref name="index" /> to the end of <paramref name="array" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection" /> cannot be cast automatically to the type of <paramref name="array" />.
Gets the number of elements in the collection.
The number of elements in the collection.
